tdgame.controller

Class MapCreationController

  • java.lang.Object
    • tdgame.controller.MapCreationController

  • public class MapCreationController
extends java.lang.Object
    This Class will bind and initialize Model-View of Main Creation Module.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      MapCreationController()
      This method is constructor.
      MapCreationController(MapCreationView view, MapCreationModel model, MainScreenController msCon)
      This method will bind and initialize Model-View of Map Creation Model.

    • Constructor Detail

      • MapCreationController

        public MapCreationController()
        This method is constructor.

      • MapCreationController

        public MapCreationController(MapCreationView view,
                             MapCreationModel model,
                             MainScreenController msCon)
        This method will bind and initialize Model-View of Map Creation Model. It will also initialize Main Screen Controller object which will be used in this class.
        Parameters:
        view - view object of Map Creation
        model - model object of Map Creation
        msCon - Controller object of Main Screen
